# readNDEF(completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Retrieves an NDEF message from the tag.

## Declaration

```swift
func readNDEF(completionHandler: @escaping (NFCNDEFMessage?, (any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func readNDEF() async throws -> NFCNDEFMessage
```

## Parameters

- **completionHandler**: The handler invoked by the reader session that provides the NDEF message. The handler has the following parameters:



The session calls `completionHandler` on the dispatch queue provided when creating the [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCNDEFReaderSession].
